instruction.title: Instruction
instruction.default: Select the icons to find out more.

_setCompletionOn.title: Completion criteria
_setCompletionOn.description: Whether completion is based on the learner having viewed all the items - or just having viewed the component

src.title: Source
src.description: This is the image that appears behind the pins

alt.title: Alternative text
alt.description: A description of the image; required when it has meaning that must be conveyed to the learner. For 'decorative' images, leave this blank

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Text to be displayed as an attribution

mobileBody.title: Mobile body
mobileBody.description: This body text is displayed on mobile devices when this component turns into a Narrative

mobileInstruction.title: Mobile instruction
mobileInstruction.description: This instruction text is displayed on mobile devices when this component turns into a Narrative
mobileInstruction.default: Select the plus icon followed by the next arrow to find out more.

_hidePagination.title: Hide pagination
_hidePagination.description: If enabled, the progress indicator and previous and next links will not be shown on the popup toolbar

_canCycleThroughPagination.title: Loop items
_canCycleThroughPagination.description: If enabled, the popup navigation buttons will cycle continuously through the popup items (i.e. clicking next whilst on the last item will cause the first item to be shown)

_isNarrativeOnMobile.title: Replace with Narrative component on mobile
_isNarrativeOnMobile.description: If disabled, the Hotgraphic will render a scaled down 'desktop' version (pins over image / tiles) of the component in 'mobile' view instead of being replaced by a Narrative interaction

_isMobileTextBelowImage.title: Move text area below image on mobile device
_isMobileTextBelowImage.description: If enabled, on mobile, the text area drops below the image instead of being behind the strapline button. Only applies when the Hot Graphic is configured to render as a Narrative on mobile

_isStackedOnMobile.title: Stack images and text on mobile
_isStackedOnMobile.description: If enabled, on mobile, text and images will be stacked vertically. No interaction will be required to view all items as the user will simply scroll down. Only applies when the Hot Graphic is configured to render as a Narrative on mobile

_useNumberedPins.title: Use numbered pins
_useNumberedPins.description: If enabled, the pin icons will be replaced with the item number. Useful if you want pins to be visited in a set order or show steps in a process

_useGraphicsAsPins.title: Use grid layout
_useGraphicsAsPins.description: If enabled, the main graphic will be hidden and pins will be displayed as images which can be positioned using classes

_hasStaticTooltips.title: Use static tooltips
_hasStaticTooltips.description: If enabled, tooltips (if themselves enabled) will always be shown rather than only on hover.

_isRound.title: Use circular popup item images
_isRound.description: If enabled, a 50% border radius will be applied to the items pop up images

_pinOffsetOrigin.title: Offset pin origin point
_pinOffsetOrigin.description: If set to `true`, the pins origin point will be changed from `top left` to `center`. This option will enable the pin to remain stationary when viewing responsively. The default is `false`.

body.title: Body
body.description: Body text displayed in the popup

strapline.title: Strapline
strapline.description: Strapline - displayed on mobile version only

_imageAlignment.title: Image alignment
_imageAlignment.description: Defines the alignment of the item image in the pop up. Left: Image aligned to the left of the text area. Top: Image aligned above the text area. Right: Image aligned to the right of the text area. Bottom: Image aligned below the text area.The default alignment is `right`.

src.title: Source
src.description: Image to be displayed in a popup when this item is selected

alt.title: Alternative text
alt.description: A description of the image; required when it has meaning that must be conveyed to the learner. For 'decorative' images, leave this blank

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Text to be displayed as an attribution for the popup image

_classes.title: Pin custom classes
_classes.description: Allows you to specify custom CSS classes to be applied to the hotgraphic pin or, alternatively, to the hotspot tile when _useGraphicsAsPins is set to true

src.title: Source
src.description: This is the pin image, leave blank for default

alt.title: Alternative text
alt.description: A description of the image; required when it has meaning that must be conveyed to the learner. For 'decorative' images, leave this blank

_classes.title: Popup item custom classes
_classes.description: Allows you to specify custom CSS classes to be applied to the popup item. Supported classes are 'align-image-left', 'hide-desktop-image', and 'hide-popup-image' which aligns the item image to the left, hides the pop up image in desktop view, and hides the pop up image for all screen sizes respectively

_isEnabled.title: Is enabled?
_isEnabled.description: If enabled, a tooltip will be displayed on hover over this item. If 'Use static tooltips' is enabled, then tooltips will always be shown.

text.title: Tooltip text
text.description: The tooltip text to display for this item

_position.title: Tooltip position
_position.description: The tooltip position in relation to the pin. Defaults to 'bottom'
